description: Models used by [CartRepository] to compute pricing breakdowns and to persist/restore promo settings.

classes.name: PromoKind
classes.description: Enumeration for types of promotional discounts, either percentage off or fixed cents off.

classes.name: AppliedPromo
classes.description: Data class representing an applied promotional code with its type and value.

classes.name: FeeSettings
classes.description: Data class encapsulating fee configurations such as delivery, service, and tax rate.

classes.name: CartTotals
classes.description: Data class containing summarized cart pricing details, including totals, subtotals, and fees.
